content: It could be that he wanted your full attention and felt that the research paper was taking away from the time you were spending with him. People have different expectations and desires in relationships, and it's possible that he had a different idea of what he wanted from your time together. It's also possible that he was upset for other reasons and was using your work as a way to express those feelings. Communication is key in relationships, and talking to him directly about your concerns and needs could have helped to resolve this issue.
